messages.title: A strong voice for Tiverton and Honiton
messages.content: Neil believes our NHS is something to be valued and he wants to continue to protect it. He campaigned hard to connect Devon businesses & homes to super-fast broadband and will continue to champion British farming and British food.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Connect Devon businesses and homes to super-fast broadband.
Continue to champion British farming and British food.
Plan to help local people get good jobs, promote rural apprenticeships.

mentions.candidate: Neil understands the importance of listening to residents' concerns and knows how to take positive action for our local communities.

issues.brexitEurope: Neil knows when the Conservatives win a majority they will deliver a referendum on Europe.
issues.education: Neil lobbied strongly for the extra 4% funding awarded to our schools by his work.
issues.health: Neil wants to keep our hospitals open and equip parents to access information for our NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Neil is a strong voice for your community and the countryside. Neil wants to listen and help address your concerns.

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigned for broadband, championing farming and British food, and lobbied for school funding.

images.caption: Neil working on issues important to Tiverton and Honiton.
